metadata.name: The Withering
metadata.description:
'The Withering' is part of the Loyalty over Royalty event as per @CryptoWill821 and will be available to collect until 11.59pm on Halloween night 2022.

I spotted this old withering, spooky looking tree when I was driving home from Belfast International Airport back in January 2022. It sat alone in a field, almost like a scarecrow. There certainly was no sign of any birds near this spooky old tree.

I returned to this tree just before sunset that day, it was so quiet, nothing about except for me and this old withering tree.

'The Withering' is a fitting image to include in @CryptoWill821, Loyalty over Royalty (Halloween) event.

Artist: Michael McCafferty

Edition: Open

License: The primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, displaying privately and in groups, including virtual galleries and documents, as long as the creator is credited.
